segments.text: Did you already wash your clothes today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've only washed my white clothes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you wash some of my dark clothes with yours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there any special care I should take with your clothes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The only thing is that they have to be washed on the gentle cycle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are there a lot of clothes ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: There aren't a lot of clothes , do you have a lot to wash ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No big deal . I'll do it for you .
segments.speaker: S2
